---
title: "run"
description: "Run the function code using the specified version and variables"
---



If no version is provided, the latest version is used.

```python
function = notte.Function("<your-function-id>")
function.run(variable1="value1", variable2="value2")
```

> Make sure that the correct variables are provided based on the python file previously uploaded. Otherwise, the workflow will fail


## Parameters

<ParamField path="version" type="UnionType[str, None]" default="None">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="local" type="bool" default="False">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="restricted" type="bool" default="True">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="timeout" type="UnionType[int, None]" default="None">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="stream" type="bool" default="True">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="raise_on_failure" type="bool" default="True">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="function_run_id" type="UnionType[str, None]" default="None">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="log_callback" type="UnionType[Callable[[<class 'str'>], None], None]" default="None">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="variables" type="Any" required>
</ParamField>

## Returns

[`FunctionRunResponse`](/sdk-reference/misc/functionrunresponse)
